sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Disable Code Signing on upgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var codeSigningAPI = new sn_cs_ns.CodeSigningAPI(); var disabledProperty = codeSigningAPI.disableCodeSigningOnUpgradeIfNeeded(); if(disabledProperty) gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("Disabled code signing property after upgrade")); else gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("Could not disable code signing property"));]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-04-23 20:03:19</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7dfc1d00c33320101109046f5e40dd81</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Disable Code Signing on upgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework Code Signing" source="sn_cs">eae404d3c31320101109046f5e40dd41</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow Key Management Framework Code Signing">eae404d3c31320101109046f5e40dd41</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_7dfc1d00c33320101109046f5e40dd81</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-04-23 21:41:23</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
